units.name: Viper
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

units.name: Bulwark
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Marksman
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets â€” medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

player.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Patch
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

units.name: Phantom
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
